name: WebVR_test4
description:
Virtual sound localization experiment

  • Use of headphones (in-ear or over-ear) is must
  • Adjust volume between 18 to 30 (Windows)
  • Click on the 'Run Game' button. 
  • Please wait till the game loads completely. (Load time depends upon your internet connection)
  • After game loads completely, click on the 'Blue arrow button' on the right bottom corner of the Unity player, to start the experiment in FULL SCREEN. (Recommended)
  • Press Escape(ESC) button to exit the Full Screen mode.
